DOC.brief_summary: Oxytocin use become routine practice elective cesarean delivery promote uterine contraction reduce blood loss . However , lack consensus regard best dose oxytocin effective route administration . Most dosage delivery system empirically derive . It currently practice Royal University Hospital start oxytocin infusion ( 20U/L ) baby deliver . Some anesthesiologist use bolus intravenous oxytocin occasionally request obstetrician . A obstetrician also choose inject bolus oxytocin directly uterus ( intramyometrial ) . The primary objective study include : 1 . Determine standard 'low dose ' oxytocin infusion adequate prophylaxis prevent need additional uterotonics , include additional oxytocin ; 2 . Determine addition prophylactic intramyometrial oxytocin improve primary outcome ( uterine tone ) secondary outcome ( estimate blood loss , preoperative postoperative change hematocrit , need additional uterotonics , need blood pressure support ) ; 3 . Act dose find study determine intramyometrial dose sufficient augment uterine contraction . The work hypothesis use intramyometrial oxytocin improve primary secondary outcome compare current practice oxytocin infusion alone .
